snippet: Trinniberg, a 50-1 long shot in Saturday’s Kentucky Derby, is a sprinter who will start at top speed and not look back, his handlers say.
abstract: Contenders at the Kentucky Derby will have to reckon with Trinniberg, 50-1 long shot who is likely to burst from the gate and set a blistering pace; Trinniberg has never run longer than seven furlongs; chart shows Derby field.
lead_paragraph: Trinniberg, a 50-1 long shot in Saturday’s Kentucky Derby, is a sprinter who will start at top speed and not look back, his handlers say.

headline.seo: Long Shot Trinniberg May Set Pace at Kentucky Derby
headline.main: Long Shot’s All-Out Style May Set Pace at the Derby
headline.print_headline: Contenders Will Have to Adjust to a Long Shot’s All-Out Style
